On_Off_switch.name: On/Off switch
On_Off_switch.description: This IPSO object should be used with an On/Off switch to report the state of the switch.

Digital_Input_State.name: Digital Input State
Digital_Input_State.description: The current state of a digital input.

Digital_Input_Counter.name: Digital Input Counter
Digital_Input_Counter.description: The number of times the input transitions from 0 to 1.

On_time.name: On time
On_time.description: The time in seconds since the On command was sent. Writing a value of 0 resets the counter.

Off_Time.name: Off Time
Off_Time.description: The time in seconds since the Off command was sent. Writing a value of 0 resets the counter.

Application_Type.name: Application Type
Application_Type.description: The application type of the sensor or actuator as a string depending on the use case.
